document.body:
This is the Jaxen navigator for XOM. The current version is 2.0.0. This release requires Java 1.5 or later. If you're still using Java 1.4, try Jaxen 1.2.0. If you're still using Java 1.3 or earlier, try Jaxen 1.1.6.
The Maven group ID is jaxen and the artifact ID is xom-navigator. To add a dependency on jaxen using Maven, add these dependency elements to your pom.xml:
<dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>jaxen-core</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>jaxen</groupId> <artifactId>xom-navigator</artifactId> <version>2.0.0</version> </dependency>
To add a dependency using Gradle:
dependencies { compile 'jaxen:jaxen-core:2.0.0' compile 'jaxen:xom-navigator:2.0.0' }
